CMD_Element.name: resourceType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the type of the resource

item.AppInfo: for individual information objects of any medium
for text, speech, image, video, multimodal/multimedia corpora, corpora with sensorimotor (numerical) information, n-gram resources. Raw or annotated content, e.g. treebanks
includes lexica, ontologies, dictionaries, word lists etc.
used for tools, systems, system components etc.
covers grammars etc.

CMD_Element.name: resourceName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name by which the resource is known; the element can be repeated for the different language versions using the "lang" attribute to specify the language.

CMD_Element.name: description
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides the description of the resource in prose

CMD_Element.name: resourceShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The short form (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used to identify the resource; the element can be repeated for the different language versions using the "lang" attribute to specify the language.

CMD_Element.name: url
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g. LR, document etc.) is located

CMD_Element.name: PID
CMD_Element.Documentation: A globally unique, persistent identifier for the resource

CMD_Element.name: identifier
CMD_Element.Documentation: An identifier, unique within some scope, not necessarily globally unique.

CMD_Element.name: availabilityStartDate
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the start date of availability of a resource - only for cases where a resource is available for a restricted time period.

CMD_Element.name: availabilityEndDate
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the end date of availability of a resource - only for cases where a resource is available for a restricted time period.

CMD_Element.name: userCategory
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides the framework for describing the conditions imposed by the nature of the user (for instance, a research use may have different implications depending on this)

item.AppInfo: Users in academic institutions
Any person
Users specifically authorized for using the resource

CMD_Element.name: distributionAccessMedium
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the medium (channel) used for delivery or providing access to the resource

CMD_Element.name: downloadLocation
CMD_Element.Documentation: Any URL where the resource can be downloaded from

CMD_Element.name: executionLocation
CMD_Element.Documentation: Any URL where the web service providing access to the resource being described and/or the web service that is being described can be executed

CMD_Element.name: fee
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the costs that are required to access the resource, a fragment of the resource or to use a tool or service

CMD_Element.name: attributionText
CMD_Element.Documentation: The text that must be quoted for attribution purposes when using a resource - for cases where a resource is provided with a restriction on attribution

enumeration.item: Norwegian Licence for Open Government Data (NLOD)
Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL)

CMD_Element.name: conditionsOfUse
CMD_Element.Documentation: Corresponds to the META-SHARE "restrictionsOfUse". Changed the name because some of its values are not actually *restrictions* (e.g. "commercial use")

item.AppInfo: other conditions
academic use
authentication required
inform copyright holder
only for LRT use
only META-SHARE members
no derivatives
no redistribution
authorization required
research plan required
personal data

CMD_Element.name: actorType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Designates whether the actor is a person or an orgaization. USAGE: If value is *person*, use personInfo for detailed info. If value is *organization*, use organizatioInfo.

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: The role or function an actor has within the context indicated by the parent component of actorInfo (e.g. contact, creator, validator, etc). Example: A resource may be assigned multiple contacts, each with their separate roles/functions, e.g. one for answering technical questions and another for any other issues.

CMD_Element.name: surname
CMD_Element.Documentation: The surname (family name) of a person related to the resource

CMD_Element.name: givenName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The given name (first name) of a person related to the resource; initials can also be used

CMD_Element.name: sex
CMD_Element.Documentation: The sex of a person related to or participating in the resource

CMD_Element.name: birthYear
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year something or someone was born

CMD_Element.name: deathYear
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year something or someone died.

CMD_Element.name: position
CMD_Element.Documentation: The position or the title of a person if affiliated to an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization

CMD_Element.name: departmentName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty or department, department or unit of a research organization or private company etc.)

CMD_Element.name: organizationName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization

CMD_Element.name: departmentName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty or department, department or unit of a research organization or private company etc.)

CMD_Element.name: email
CMD_Element.Documentation: The email address of a person or an organization

CMD_Element.name: url
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g. LR, document etc.) is located

CMD_Element.name: address
CMD_Element.Documentation: The street and the number of the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: zipCode
CMD_Element.Documentation: The zip code of the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: city
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the city, town or village as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: region
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the region, county or department as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: country
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the country mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization as defined in the list of values of ISO 3166

CMD_Element.name: telephoneNumber
CMD_Element.Documentation: The telephone number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number

CMD_Element.name: faxNumber
CMD_Element.Documentation: The fax number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number

CMD_Element.name: metadataCreationDate
CMD_Element.Documentation: The date of creation of this metadata description.

CMD_Element.name: source
CMD_Element.Documentation: Refers to the catalogue or repository from which the metadata has originated

CMD_Element.name: originalMetadataSchema
CMD_Element.Documentation: Refers to the metadata schema originally used for the description of the resource

CMD_Element.name: originalMetadataLink
CMD_Element.Documentation: A link to the original metadata record, in cases of harvesting

CMD_Element.name: metadataLanguageName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the language in which the metadata description is written; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: metadataLanguageId
CMD_Element.Documentation: The identifier of the language in which the metadata description is written; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: metadataLastDateUpdated
CMD_Element.Documentation: The date of the last updating of the metadata record.

CMD_Element.name: revision
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides an account of the revisions in free text or a link to a document with revisions

CMD_Element.name: actorType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Designates whether the actor is a person or an orgaization. USAGE: If value is *person*, use personInfo for detailed info. If value is *organization*, use organizatioInfo.

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: The role or function an actor has within the context indicated by the parent component of actorInfo (e.g. contact, creator, validator, etc). Example: A resource may be assigned multiple contacts, each with their separate roles/functions, e.g. one for answering technical questions and another for any other issues.

CMD_Element.name: telephoneNumber

CMD_Element.name: faxNumber

CMD_Element.name: version
CMD_Element.Documentation: Any string, usually a number, that identifies the version of a resource

CMD_Element.name: revision
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides an account of the revisions in free text or a link to a document with revisions

CMD_Element.name: lastDateUpdated
CMD_Element.Documentation: Date of the last update of the version of the resource

CMD_Element.name: updateFrequency
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the frequency with which the resource is updated

CMD_Element.name: validated
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the validation status of the resource

CMD_Element.name: validationType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the type of the validation that has been performed

CMD_Element.name: validationMode
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the validation methodology applied

CMD_Element.name: validationModeDetails
CMD_Element.Documentation: Textual field for additional information on validation

CMD_Element.name: validationExtent
CMD_Element.Documentation: The resource coverage in terms of validated data

CMD_Element.name: validationExtentDetails
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides information on the size or other details of partially validated data; to be used if only part of the resource has been validated and as an alternative to sizePerValidation if the validated part cannot be counted otherwise

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: role of documents

CMD_Element.name: documentType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the type of the document provided with or related to the resource

item.AppInfo: An article from a journal or magazine
A book with an explicit publisher
A work that is printed and bound, but without a named publisher or sponsoring institution
Technical documentation
A report published by a school or other institution
A Master's thesis
A PhD thesis
A part of a book, which may be a chapter (or section) and/or a range of pages
A part of a book having its own title
The proceedings of a conference
An article in a conference proceedings
A document having an author and title, but not formally published
Use this type when nothing else fits

CMD_Element.name: title
CMD_Element.Documentation: The title of the document; the element can be repeated for the different language versions using the "lang" attribute to specify the language.

CMD_Element.name: author
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name(s) of the author(s); for multiple authors, please use "and" in between.

CMD_Element.name: editor
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name(s) of the editor(s); in case of multiple editors, please use "and" in between

CMD_Element.name: year
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year of publication or, for an unpublished work, the year it was written

CMD_Element.name: publisher
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the publisher/publishing house

CMD_Element.name: bookTitle
CMD_Element.Documentation: The title of a book, part of which is being cited

CMD_Element.name: journal
CMD_Element.Documentation: A journal name; abbreviations could also be provided

CMD_Element.name: volume
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the volume of a journal or multivolume book

CMD_Element.name: series
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of a series or set of books; when citing an entire book, the title field gives its title and an optional series field gives the name of a series or multi-volume set in which the book is published

CMD_Element.name: pages
CMD_Element.Documentation: One or more page numbers or range of page numbers

CMD_Element.name: edition
CMD_Element.Documentation: The edition of a book

CMD_Element.name: conference
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the conference in which the document has been presented

CMD_Element.name: doi
CMD_Element.Documentation: A digital object identifier assigned to the document

CMD_Element.name: url
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g. LR, document etc.) is located

CMD_Element.name: ISSN
CMD_Element.Documentation: The International Standard Serial Number used to identify a journal

CMD_Element.name: ISBN
CMD_Element.Documentation: The International Standard Book Number

CMD_Element.name: keywords
CMD_Element.Documentation: The keyword(s) for indexing and classification of the document

CMD_Element.name: documentLanguageName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the language the document is written in, as mentioned in IETF BCP47; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: documentLanguageId
CMD_Element.Documentation: The id of the language the document is written in; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: role of documents

CMD_Element.name: documentUnstructured
CMD_Element.Documentation: Used either as a free text description or as an unstructured (free form) presentation of a bibliographic record; alternative to the structured presentation of a document (cf. documentInfo)

CMD_Element.name: targetResourceNameURI
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name or url or identifier of a resource related to the one being described

CMD_Element.name: actorType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Designates whether the actor is a person or an orgaization. USAGE: If value is *person*, use personInfo for detailed info. If value is *organization*, use organizatioInfo.

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: The role or function an actor has within the context indicated by the parent component of actorInfo (e.g. contact, creator, validator, etc). Example: A resource may be assigned multiple contacts, each with their separate roles/functions, e.g. one for answering technical questions and another for any other issues.

CMD_Element.name: surname
CMD_Element.Documentation: The surname (family name) of a person related to the resource

CMD_Element.name: givenName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The given name (first name) of a person related to the resource; initials can also be used

CMD_Element.name: sex
CMD_Element.Documentation: The sex of a person related to or participating in the resource

CMD_Element.name: birthYear
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year something or someone was born

CMD_Element.name: deathYear
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year something or someone died.

CMD_Element.name: position
CMD_Element.Documentation: The position or the title of a person if affiliated to an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization

CMD_Element.name: departmentName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty or department, department or unit of a research organization or private company etc.)

CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization

CMD_Element.name: departmentName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty or department, department or unit of a research organization or private company etc.)

CMD_Element.name: email
CMD_Element.Documentation: The email address of a person or an organization

CMD_Element.name: url
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g. LR, document etc.) is located

CMD_Element.name: address
CMD_Element.Documentation: The street and the number of the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: zipCode
CMD_Element.Documentation: The zip code of the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: city
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the city, town or village as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: region
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the region, county or department as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: country
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the country mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization as defined in the list of values of ISO 3166

CMD_Element.name: telephoneNumber
CMD_Element.Documentation: The telephone number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number

CMD_Element.name: faxNumber
CMD_Element.Documentation: The fax number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number

CMD_Element.name: samplesLocation
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL with samples of the resource or, in the case of tools, of samples of the output

CMD_Element.name: toolDocumentationType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the type of documentation for tool or service

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: role of documents

CMD_Element.name: documentUnstructured
CMD_Element.Documentation: Used either as a free text description or as an unstructured (free form) presentation of a bibliographic record; alternative to the structured presentation of a document (cf. documentInfo)

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: role of documents

CMD_Element.name: documentType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the type of the document provided with or related to the resource

item.AppInfo: An article from a journal or magazine
A book with an explicit publisher
A work that is printed and bound, but without a named publisher or sponsoring institution
Technical documentation
A report published by a school or other institution
A Master's thesis
A PhD thesis
A part of a book, which may be a chapter (or section) and/or a range of pages
A part of a book having its own title
The proceedings of a conference
An article in a conference proceedings
A document having an author and title, but not formally published
Use this type when nothing else fits

CMD_Element.name: title
CMD_Element.Documentation: The title of the document; the element can be repeated for the different language versions using the "lang" attribute to specify the language.

CMD_Element.name: author
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name(s) of the author(s); for multiple authors, please use "and" in between.

CMD_Element.name: editor
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name(s) of the editor(s); in case of multiple editors, please use "and" in between

CMD_Element.name: year
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year of publication or, for an unpublished work, the year it was written

CMD_Element.name: publisher
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the publisher/publishing house

CMD_Element.name: bookTitle
CMD_Element.Documentation: The title of a book, part of which is being cited

CMD_Element.name: journal
CMD_Element.Documentation: A journal name; abbreviations could also be provided

CMD_Element.name: volume
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the volume of a journal or multivolume book

CMD_Element.name: series
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of a series or set of books; when citing an entire book, the title field gives its title and an optional series field gives the name of a series or multi-volume set in which the book is published

CMD_Element.name: pages
CMD_Element.Documentation: One or more page numbers or range of page numbers

CMD_Element.name: edition
CMD_Element.Documentation: The edition of a book

CMD_Element.name: conference
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the conference in which the document has been presented

CMD_Element.name: doi
CMD_Element.Documentation: A digital object identifier assigned to the document

CMD_Element.name: url
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g. LR, document etc.) is located

CMD_Element.name: ISSN
CMD_Element.Documentation: The International Standard Serial Number used to identify a journal

CMD_Element.name: ISBN
CMD_Element.Documentation: The International Standard Book Number

CMD_Element.name: keywords
CMD_Element.Documentation: The keyword(s) for indexing and classification of the document

CMD_Element.name: documentLanguageName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the language the document is written in, as mentioned in IETF BCP47; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: documentLanguageId
CMD_Element.Documentation: The id of the language the document is written in; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: creationStartDate
CMD_Element.Documentation: The date in which the creation process was started

CMD_Element.name: creationEndDate
CMD_Element.Documentation: The date in which the creation process was completed

CMD_Element.name: actorType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Designates whether the actor is a person or an orgaization. USAGE: If value is *person*, use personInfo for detailed info. If value is *organization*, use organizatioInfo.

CMD_Element.name: role
CMD_Element.Documentation: The role or function an actor has within the context indicated by the parent component of actorInfo (e.g. contact, creator, validator, etc). Example: A resource may be assigned multiple contacts, each with their separate roles/functions, e.g. one for answering technical questions and another for any other issues.

CMD_Element.name: surname
CMD_Element.Documentation: The surname (family name) of a person related to the resource

CMD_Element.name: givenName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The given name (first name) of a person related to the resource; initials can also be used

CMD_Element.name: sex
CMD_Element.Documentation: The sex of a person related to or participating in the resource

CMD_Element.name: birthYear
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year something or someone was born

CMD_Element.name: deathYear
CMD_Element.Documentation: The year something or someone died.

CMD_Element.name: position
CMD_Element.Documentation: The position or the title of a person if affiliated to an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization

CMD_Element.name: departmentName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty or department, department or unit of a research organization or private company etc.)

CMD_Element.name: organizationName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of an organization

CMD_Element.name: organizationShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The short name (abbreviation, acronym etc.) used for an organization

CMD_Element.name: departmentName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the department or unit (e.g. specific university faculty or department, department or unit of a research organization or private company etc.)

CMD_Element.name: email
CMD_Element.Documentation: The email address of a person or an organization

CMD_Element.name: url
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g. LR, document etc.) is located

CMD_Element.name: address
CMD_Element.Documentation: The street and the number of the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: zipCode
CMD_Element.Documentation: The zip code of the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: city
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the city, town or village as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: region
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the region, county or department as mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization

CMD_Element.name: country
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the country mentioned in the postal address of a person or organization as defined in the list of values of ISO 3166

CMD_Element.name: telephoneNumber
CMD_Element.Documentation: The telephone number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number

CMD_Element.name: faxNumber
CMD_Element.Documentation: The fax number of a person or an organization; recommended format: +_international code_city code_number

CMD_Element.name: projectName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of a project related to the resource

CMD_Element.name: projectShortName
CMD_Element.Documentation: A short name or abbreviation of a project related to the resource

CMD_Element.name: projectID
CMD_Element.Documentation: An unambiguous referent to a project related to the resource

CMD_Element.name: url
CMD_Element.Documentation: A URL used as homepage of an entity (e.g. of a person, organization, resource etc.) and/or where an entity (e.g. LR, document etc.) is located

CMD_Element.name: fundingType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the type of funding of the project

item.AppInfo: Funding coming from EU sources
Funding coming from national sources
Funding from the resource creators’s own sources
When none of the above is applicable

CMD_Element.name: funder
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name of the funder of the project

CMD_Element.name: fundingCountry
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the funding country, in case of national funding, as mentioned in ISO3166

CMD_Element.name: projectStartDate
CMD_Element.Documentation: The starting date of a project related to the resource

CMD_Element.name: projectEndDate
CMD_Element.Documentation: The end date of a project related to the resources

CMD_Element.name: referenceScope
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates whether the referenced resource is external or internal or the described resource as a whole.

item.AppInfo: Listed in ResourceProxyList
Resource not covered by this metadata record
The described resource as a whole

CMD_Element.name: resourceReference
CMD_Element.Documentation: Reference to a resource by (resolvable) PID or other URI. To be used when the referenced resource is external to the described resource.

CMD_Element.name: relationName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name (designator) of the relation. In CMDI 1.2. to be specified via a relationship vocabulary?

CMD_Element.name: relationConceptLink
CMD_Element.Documentation: The meaning of the relationitself, as defined in some authorised concept registry. (In CMDI 1.2. this should be defined to take values from an external vocabulary, namely Clarin Concept Registry)

item.AppInfo: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included.
A related resource that is substantially the same as the described resource, but in another format.
A related resource that references, cites, or otherwise points to the described resource.
A related resource that supplants, displaces, or supersedes the described resource.
A related resource that requires the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.
A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation.
A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

CMD_Element.name: referenceScope
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates whether the referenced resource is external or internal or the described resource as a whole.

item.AppInfo: Listed in ResourceProxyList
Resource not covered by this metadata record
The described resource as a whole

CMD_Element.name: resourceReference
CMD_Element.Documentation: Reference to a resource by (resolvable) PID or other URI. To be used when the referenced resource is external to the described resource.

CMD_Element.name: lexicalConceptualResourceType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the subtype of lexicalConceptualResource

CMD_Element.name: lingualityType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates whether the resource includes one, two or more languages

CMD_Element.name: languageId
CMD_Element.Documentation: The identifier of the language that is included in the resource or supported by the tool/service; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: languageName
CMD_Element.Documentation: A human understandable name of the language that is used in the resource or supported by the tool/service; an autocompletion mechanism with values from the ISO 639 is provided in the editor, but the values can be subsequently edited for further specification (according to the IETF BCP47 guidelines)

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: languageVarietyType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the type of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service

CMD_Element.name: languageVarietyName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the language variety that occurs in the resource or is supported by a tool/service

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: modalityType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the type of the modality represented in the resource or processed by a tool/service

CMD_Element.name: modalityTypeDetails
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides further information on modalities

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: domain
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the application domain of the resource or the tool/service

CMD_Element.name: conformanceToClassificationScheme
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the external classification schemes

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: geographicCoverage
CMD_Element.Documentation: The geographic region that the content of a resource is about; for countries, recommended use of ISO-3166

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: timeCoverage
CMD_Element.Documentation: The time period when the content of a resource was created

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: creationMode
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies whether the resource is created automatically, manually or in interactive mode

CMD_Element.name: creationModeDetails
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides further information on the creation methods and processes

CMD_Element.name: targetResourceNameURI
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name or url or identifier of a resource related to the one being described

CMD_Element.name: targetResourceNameURI
CMD_Element.Documentation: The full name or url or identifier of a resource related to the one being described

CMD_Element.name: encodingLevel
CMD_Element.Documentation: Information on the linguistic levels covered by the resource (grammar or lexical/conceptual resource)

CMD_Element.name: linguisticInformation
CMD_Element.Documentation: A more detailed account of the linguistic information contained in the lexicalConceptualResource

CMD_Element.name: conformanceToStandardsBestPractices
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the standards or the best practices to which the tagset used for the annotation or the encoding scheme of a resource (e.g. grammar / lexical resource) conforms

CMD_Element.name: theoreticModel
CMD_Element.Documentation: Name of the theoretic model applied for the creation or enrichment of the resource, and/or reference (URL or bibliographic reference) to informative material about the theoretic model used

CMD_Element.name: externalRef
CMD_Element.Documentation: Another resource to which the lexicalConceptualResource is linked (e.g. link to a wordnet or ontology)

CMD_Element.name: extratextualInformation
CMD_Element.Documentation: An indication of the extratextual information contained in the lexicalConceptualResouce; can be used as an alternative to audio, image, videos etc. for cases where these are not considered an important part of the lcr

CMD_Element.name: extraTextualInformationUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: The unit of the extratextual information contained in the lexical conceptual resource

CMD_Element.name: mediaType
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the media type of the resource and basically corresponds to the physical medium of the content representation. Each media type is described through a distinctive set of features. A resource may consist of parts attributed to different types of media. A tool/service may take as input/output more than one different media types.

item.AppInfo: for a whole resource or part of a resource that is recorded as an audio file
for stillimage like photographs, drawings etc.
only written medium
for moving image; used for multi-media corpora, with video for the moving image part

CMD_Element.name: speechItems
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the distinct elements that are pronounced and annotated as such

CMD_Element.name: nonSpeechItems
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the distinct elements that maybe included in the audio corpus

CMD_Element.name: textualDescription
CMD_Element.Documentation: The legend of the soundtrack

CMD_Element.name: noiseLevel
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the level of background noise

CMD_Element.name: mimeType
CMD_Element.Documentation: The mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts; value to be taken from a subset of the official mime types of the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority

CMD_Element.name: signalEncoding
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the encoding the audio type uses

CMD_Element.name: samplingRate
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the format of files contained in the resource in Hertz

CMD_Element.name: quantization
CMD_Element.Documentation: The number of bits for each audio sample

CMD_Element.name: byteOrder
CMD_Element.Documentation: The byte order of 2 or more bytes sample

CMD_Element.name: signConvention
CMD_Element.Documentation: Binary representation of numbers

CMD_Element.name: audioQualityMeasuresIncluded
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the audio quality measures

CMD_Element.name: numberOfTracks
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the number of audio channels

CMD_Element.name: recordingQuality
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indication of the audio or video recording quality

CMD_Element.name: compression
CMD_Element.Documentation: Whether the audio, video or image is compressed or not

CMD_Element.name: compressionName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the compression applied

CMD_Element.name: compressionLoss
CMD_Element.Documentation: Whether there is loss due to compression

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: typeOfImageContent
CMD_Element.Documentation: The main types of object or people represented in the image corpus

CMD_Element.name: textIncludedInImage
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides information on the type of text that may be on the image

CMD_Element.name: typeOfElement
CMD_Element.Documentation: The type of objects or people that represented in the video or image part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: bodyParts
CMD_Element.Documentation: The body parts visible in the video or image part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: faceViews
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the view of the face(s) that appear in the video or on the image part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: faceExpressions
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the facial expressions visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: artifactParts
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the parts of the artifacts represented in the image corpus

CMD_Element.name: landscapeParts
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the landscape parts represented in the image corpus

CMD_Element.name: personDescription
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides descriptive features for the persons represented in the image corpus

CMD_Element.name: thingDescription
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides a description of the things represented in the image corpus

CMD_Element.name: organizationDescription
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides a description of the organizations that may appear in the image corpus

CMD_Element.name: eventDescription
CMD_Element.Documentation: Provides a description of any events represented in the image corpus

CMD_Element.name: mimeType
CMD_Element.Documentation: The mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts; value to be taken from a subset of the official mime types of the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority

CMD_Element.name: colourSpace
CMD_Element.Documentation: Defines the colour space for the video

CMD_Element.name: colourDepth
CMD_Element.Documentation: The number of bits used to represent the colour of a single pixel

CMD_Element.name: visualModelling
CMD_Element.Documentation: The dimensional form applied on video or image corpus

CMD_Element.name: rasterOrVectorGraphics
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates if the image is stored as raster or vector graphics

CMD_Element.name: quality
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the quality level of image resource

CMD_Element.name: compression
CMD_Element.Documentation: Whether the audio, video or image is compressed or not

CMD_Element.name: compressionName
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the compression applied

CMD_Element.name: compressionLoss
CMD_Element.Documentation: Whether there is loss due to compression

CMD_Element.name: sizeWidth
CMD_Element.Documentation: The frame width in pixels

CMD_Element.name: sizeHeight
CMD_Element.Documentation: The frame height in pixels

CMD_Element.name: resolutionStandard
CMD_Element.Documentation: The standard to which the resolution conforms

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: mimeType
CMD_Element.Documentation: The mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts; value to be taken from a subset of the official mime types of the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: characterEncoding
CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the character encoding used in the resource or accepted by the tool/service

CMD_Element.name: size
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the size of the resource with regard to the sizeUnit measurement in form of a number

CMD_Element.name: sizeUnit
CMD_Element.Documentation: Specifies the unit that is used when providing information on the size of the resource or of resource parts

CMD_Element.name: typeOfVideoContent
CMD_Element.Documentation: Main type of object or people represented in the video

CMD_Element.name: textIncludedInVideo
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates if text is present in or in conjunction with the video

CMD_Element.name: typeOfElement
CMD_Element.Documentation: The type of objects or people that represented in the video or image part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: bodyParts
CMD_Element.Documentation: The body parts visible in the video or image part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: distractors
CMD_Element.Documentation: Any distractors visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: interactiveMedia
CMD_Element.Documentation: Any interactive media visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: faceViews
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the view of the face(s) that appear in the video or on the image part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: faceExpressions
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the facial expressions visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: bodyMovement
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the body parts that move in the video part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: gestures
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the type of gestures visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: handArmMovement
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the movement of hands and/or arms visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: handManipulation
CMD_Element.Documentation: Gives information on the manipulation of objects by hand

CMD_Element.name: headMovement
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the movements of the head visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: eyeMovement
CMD_Element.Documentation: Indicates the movement of the eyes visible in the resource

CMD_Element.name: posesPerSubject
CMD_Element.Documentation: The number of poses per subject that participates in the video part of the resource

CMD_Element.name: mimeType
CMD_Element.Documentation: The mime-type of the resource which is a formalized specifier for the format included or a mime-type that the tool/service accepts; value to be taken from a subset of the official mime types of the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority

CMD_Element.Documentation: Defines the colour space for the video

CMD_Element.name: colourDepth
CMD_Element.Documentation: The number of bits used to represent the colour of a single pixel

CMD_Element.name: frameRate
CMD_Element.Documentation: The number of frames per second

CMD_Element.name: visualModelling
CMD_Element.Documentation: The dimensional form applied on video or image corpus

CMD_Element.name: fidelity
CMD_Element.Documentation: Defines whether blur is present in the moving sequences

CMD_Element.name: sizeWidth
CMD_Element.Documentation: The frame width in pixels

CMD_Element.name: sizeHeight
CMD_Element.Documentation: The frame height in pixels

CMD_Element.name: resolutionStandard
CMD_Element.Documentation: The standard to which the resolution conforms

CMD_Element.Documentation: Whether the audio, video or image is compressed or not

CMD_Element.Documentation: The name of the compression applied
